response.overview: Described by film scholar Linda Williams as a "typical" stag film, the film tells the story of a woman who has applied for a job in a warehouse. Shortly thereafter, a man makes a sexual advance toward her. Crucially, although intertitles proclaim the ensuing sex act to be coerced, Williams describes the actual footage as showing a woman who "gives in" to the man's advance. According to Williams, the film presents "the classic dilemma of rape in a sexist society: the suspicion that the victim wants to be victimized."
response.title: Rape in a Warehouse
